column6: "AGE OF X" CHAPTER 5! In the Age Of X, there are no X-Men. There are no heroes to stand in the way of the anti-mutant aggression that has run rampant for years. And when the world's most dangerous mutant is set loose in this Age, everything will come crashing down.
column8: | writer:Mike Carey | editor:Daniel Ketchum | penciller:Clay Mann | penciller (cover):Mico Suayan
